pylapp.smoothclicker.android.notifiers

Class VibrationNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.notifiers.VibrationNotifier

  • public class VibrationNotifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class which manages vibrations notifications. It is based on a wrapper design pattern. Be sure you use the dedicated permission
    Since:
    16/03/2016
    Version:
    1.3.0
    Author:
    pylapp

      private static java.lang.String LOG_TAG 
      private Context mContext
      The context to use to get the vibrator
      static int VIBRATE_ON_CLICK_DURATION
      The duration of a vibration in ms if the device must vibrate on each click
      static int VIBRATE_ON_START_DURATION
      The duration of a vibration in ms if the device must vibrate on start
